section.title: The MiscGoto DLL Exports command
section.para: When you have opened a DLL, you can use this function to navigate to the list of DLL exports. The list will be highlighted, if possible.

note.para: It is likely that only part of the DLL exports will be highlighted, due to the way the PE file format is specified.

section.title: The MiscGoto DLL Imports command
section.para: When you have opened a DLL, you can use this function to navigate to the list of DLL imports. The list will be highlighted, if possible.

note.para: It is likely that only part of the DLL imports will be highlighted, due to the way the PE file format is specified.

section.title: The MiscEncode Decode command
section.para: This command will open a dialog, where you can encode/decode data using a cryptographic algorithm. The cryptographic algorithms are implemented in the FRHEDX.DLL. You can write your own extension DLL to implement alternate algorithms; please check the Frhed sourcecode for more details.
